pages.title: Flint
pages.text: Mining Level: Stone (1) $(br2)Mining Speed: 3.5 $(br2)Base Durability: 112 $(br2)Durability Multiplier: 1.2 $(br2)Attack Damage: +0.8

pages.title: Traits
pages.text: $(8)Brittle: $()$(br)The tool is brittle and is not durable. $(br2)$(0)Crude: $()$(br)The tool can mine quicker. $(br2)$(0)Primal: $()$(br)The tool deals extra attack damage.
